title: 【Student Dormitory Announcement】Please claim personal belongings in the storage area as soon as possible
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03890-6217
對象： 全校學生_大一_大二_大三_大四以上_碩士生_博士生
標題： 【Student Dormitory Announcement】Please claim personal belongings in the storage area as soon as possible
日期： Fri, 20 Sep 2024 16:42:46 +0800

Dear All,
        In order to provide a clean and comfortable accommodation, the students who haven’t claim the personal belongings in dorms are required to claim personal belongings stored in the storage area before 2024/10/31 (Thu). Any luggage not claimed will be gathered to a different location. Items not picked up before 2024/12/31 (Tue) will be treated as waste and the school will not be responsible for storage and compensation. Please kindly claim your belongings in time. Thank you~



~ Office of Student Affairs and Life Division ~
